title: NEW OnePlus 8 Pro Overview!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Today we're checking out two new phones from One Plus, the OnePlus 8 Pro and the OnePlus 8. We should probably unbox these first. Yeah I know, they're unboxed already, don't ask questions. (hip hop music) The 8 Pro has a 6.78 inch, 120 hertz, QHD fluid display. Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 processor, it's 5G compatible, and you can get up to 12 gigs of RAM, plus 256 gigs of storage. It has a 4,510 milliamp battery, Wi-Fi 6 enabled, a quad camera, and it comes in three colors: Onyx Black, Ultramarine Blue, and Interstellar Glow. The 8 has a 6.55-inch, 90 hertz fluid display, also running Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 with 5G, and also can be configured up to 12 gigs of RAM with 256 gigs of storage, with a triple camera setup. (hip hop music) This color is so incredibly beautiful, it actually took my breath away. I wasn't recording my reaction when I opened this, but if I was, it would've been something like this. (gasps) And I love that it's kind of a matte finish, so the fingerprints are way less visible than on the OnePlus 8, but this color, if I didn't see this blue first, this interstellar glow (gasps) has my name on it. It's got a really nice rainbow reflection, we'll get more into the phones in a second, but I've got some cases and one of the new Warp Charge 30 wireless chargers. This is pretty great because OnePlus Pro has a 4,510 milliamp battery so you can charge 1% to 50% in just half hour with this new wireless charger. While the regular OnePlus doesn't have wireless charging, you can charge the 4,300 milliamp battery using the Warp Charge 30T charger. In 22 minutes, you can go from 1% to 50%. Let's check out some of these new cases. (hip hop music) (boxes ripping) Oh yeah. There we go, that looks nice. This new quad camera is something that I think everyone is gonna be really excited about. The eight megapixel 3X Telephoto will give you up to 30X digital zoom, plus enhanced optical image stabilization. The ultra wide is 48 megapixels, it'll give you 120 degree field of view. It also features super macro mode, which you can capture images up to three centimeters away. The main camera also is a 48 megapixel camera and the color filter camera is five megapixels. So now that we're outside in my confined backyard, still got my house slippers on because that's what we do here (laughs) now. Do you wanna tell us about your quarantine? How's it going? Let's focus on your little face. There we go. Quarantine pup. Are you having a time? Look at his nose! You can see everything! Gosh, I do not wanna do that to my face. The display on the OnePlus 8 Pro is really incredible. That 120 hertz refresh rate is really impressive. The display also has the highest color accuracy ever on a OnePlus phone. It supports to true-to-life colors with HDR 10 plus. It's eight millimeters thin, you can configure it in two different models, an eight gig or 12 gig. Much like most phones that aren't iPhones, it does have an in-display fingerprint sensor. Using LPDDR4X RAM, this allows the phone to ramp up the memory speeds by 30% while lowering power consumption by 20%. It has dual speakers, powered by Dolby Atmos with a new haptic vibration engine. This will allow your content and games to feel more true-to-life. With Warp Charge, you can go from 1% to 50% battery in a half hour with their new wireless Warp Charge 30. It also has reverse wireless charging, so in 23 minutes, that can give you up to a 50% battery life. Using this phone outdoors is really great because the maximum brightness of the display is 1,300 nits, and it also has an adaptive color temperature with up to 4,096 brightness levels.
